1370: Kerolus moved to In den Haeg.C.0 after marriage.
Got married to Volcwiif at age 31 in 1370.
Had a daughter with Volcwiif, Machtilden, at age 31.
1372: Had a daughter with Volcwiif, Hilduardis, at age 33.
Lost daughter Machtilden when Machtilden was 3 years old.
1374: Had a son with Volcwiif, Michiel, at age 35.
1376: Had a son with Volcwiif, Jacobus, at age 37.
1380: Lost son Franse when Franse was 0 years old.
Volcwiif gave birth to their stillborn son Franse in 1380.
1381: Lost son Jacobus when Jacobus was 6 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
1382: Had a son with Volcwiif, Wellinus, at age 43.
